name: Alliance Visa Platinum Virtual Credit Card
description: The Alliance Visa Platinum Virtual Credit Card is ideal for Malaysians who use E-Wallets frequently, and loves online shopping. It is a fully digital reward points credit card with no plastic card issued.

rows.category: All other transactions (incl. Instalment Payment Plan, Flexi Payment Plan, JomPay and FPX transactions)

highlights: Fully digital credit card, no plastic issued
8x reward points on e-wallet reloads & online shopping
No annual fee - Free for Life
